The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/Users/inthek/Documents/react_repo/bulna.serviceRawFile:
service: iam-bulnande-admin

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs22.x
  region: ap-northeast-2
  environment:
    JWT_SECRET: ${env:JWT_SECRET}
    JWT_EXPIRES_IN: ${env:JWT_EXPIRES_IN}
    REFRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRES_IN: ${env:REFRESH_TOKEN_EXPIRES_IN}
    DYNAMODB_TABLE_USERS: IamBulnande_Users
    DYNAMODB_TABLE_EVENTS: IamBulnande_Events
    CUSTOM_AWS_REGION: ${env:AWS_REGION}
  iam:
    role:
      statements:
        - Effect: Allow
          Action:
            - dynamodb:Query
            - dynamodb:Scan
            - dynamodb:GetItem
            - dynamodb:PutItem
            - dynamodb:UpdateItem
            - dynamodb:DeleteItem
          Resource:
            - arn:aws:dynamodb:ap-northeast-2:${aws:accountId}:table/IamBulnande_Users
            - arn:aws:dynamodb:ap-northeast-2:${aws:accountId}:table/IamBulnande_Events
      managedPolicies:
        - 'arn:aws:iam::aws:policy/service-role/AWSLambdaBasicExecutionRole'
      assumeRolePolicy:
        Version: '2012-10-17'
        Statement:
          - Effect: Allow
            Principal:
              Service: lambda.amazonaws.com
            Action: sts:AssumeRole

functions:
  api:
    handler: dist/lambda.handler
    events:
      - http:
          method: ANY
          path: /
          cors: true
      - http:
          method: ANY
          path: '{proxy+}'
          cors: true

plugins:
  - serverless-offline
